resources.string: Tchami, is a house music producer from Paris, France. His stage name was given to him when he was in Africa. He was widely recognized after releasing his remix of \"Go Deep\" by Janet Jackson.\n\n Tchami has done several supporting tours with big names such as Skrillex, Diplo, DJ Snake. His style of production is often referred to as "future house". He has remixed and collaborated with the likes of Oliver $, AlunaGeorge, Kaleem Taylor, Mercer, DJ Snake, and AC Slater. His song "Promesses" has charted at number 7 on the UK Charts.
